title: A Better train of thought
creator_credit: Attila Dargay, Stephen Bosustow and MAFILM Pannonia Filmstudio
brief_description: An animated allegorical comment on progress and power. Indignant when another train passes them, passengers on an old train try a variety of ways to speed it up - to no avail. They reject a revolutionary design proposed by one passenger, who leaves to return as the designer of an obviously superior vehicle.
creator_credit_for_label: Attila Dargay, Stephen Bosustow and MAFILM Pannonia Filmstudio
